_header: It wern four letters of purpose I / of M and A R and I
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: A song in praise of the Virgin Mary — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘M & A & R & I / Syngyn I wyl a newe song’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Of þes iiii letters purpose Iof M & A R &
                    I…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…& wep[t] water ful bytterly& terys of blod euer
                    among

BLSl2593.First Lines:
It wern fowre letterys of purposyM & A & R &
                    I…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Saue now al this cumpany& send vs joye & blysse
                    ammong
